message.content: {"id": "17289", "title": "Bug 17289 - Combo doesn't take focus by clicking on it (Photon)", "description": "When trying to click on the first Combo, it does not take focus.", "OB": "The focus caret should be in the first Combo 'Host:' when clicking on it.", "EB": "The focus caret is not in the first Combo 'Host:' when clicking on it.", "SR": "To reproduce the issue, open the 'Add a new CVS Repository' dialog and press 'Tab'. The focus should go to the second Combo 'Repository Path:' instead of the first Combo 'Host:'."}

origin.input_prompt:

In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
